name: No Country for Old Men
des: A relentless game of cat and mouse explores morality, greed, and fate in West Texas.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
des: An animated superhero film featuring Miles Morales, a teenager who becomes Spider-Man and teams up with other versions of the iconic hero from different dimensions to save the multiverse.

name: The Godfather Part II
des: An epic saga of power, betrayal, and legacy exploring Vito and Michael Corleone's parallel stories.

name: La Vita Ã¨ Bella (Life Is Beautiful)
des: A heartwarming and tragic story about an Italian Jewish man who uses humor and imagination to protect his son from the horrors of a Nazi concentration camp.

name: Baahubali: The Beginning
des: An epic tale of courage, betrayal, and destiny in a mythical kingdom.

name: Life is Beautiful
des: A Jewish Italian man uses his imagination and humor to shield his son from the horrors of a concentration camp, turning their grim reality into a game to protect his child's innocence.

name: The Intouchables
des: The Intouchables, a heartwarming comedy-drama about the friendship between two men from different social classes. An inspiring and uplifting story.

name: The Godfather Part III
des: The final chapter in the epic Godfather saga, focusing on Michael Corleone's attempts to legitimize his family's business while dealing with personal and external conflicts.

name: Avatar
des: A visually groundbreaking journey to the world of Pandora and its majestic inhabitants.

name: Parasite
des: A dark and compelling exploration of class struggle and human nature.
